scenario_text.value: He’s asking for help! We should go save him!

(Is it that boy asking for help? And if it
is, should we really get involved?)

(Ugh, it’s just too creepy! Maybe we’d better
not respond...)

Agumon, wait! This, uh... This could be
a trap!

Yeah, like he’s trying to draw us out and
then drag us down to Hell...
Never mind that! Just keep your distance!

(I panicked, so that was all I could think
of, but I feel like we should stay away.)
